pages.text: You've found a key to a $(bold)Teleporter Hub!$() Each teleporter hub is technically a dungeon, but there are no mobs or treasure. Instead there is just one big open room with 8 doors leading to 8 portals. Each of those doors has its own key.

You are currently holding the key to the first of 8 doors. When you enter you'll be able to take the other 7 keys. Any portals you build with those keys will connect logically. Now you have the power to quickly travel great distances and even across dimensions at convenience!

Remember that portals to the dungeon dimension can be built in any dimension. You could use your keys to build a shortcut between your base, a stronghold, and the outer end islands. Each blank teleporter hub key that you find will lead to a new hub with seven different keys. All teleporter hub keys are unreplaceable so do not lose them!
